title: Coronavirus and Soft Ass Entrepreneurs
itunes:title: Coronavirus and Soft Ass Entrepreneurs
description:
Let's be real. We're going through it right now. It seems like COVID-19 is bleeding into every part of our lives, and entrepreneurs in particular are feeling the pain - some more than others. But at the end of the day, we control how we react to every situation. So, how are you handling this crisis?
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach tackles the Coronavirus problem head-on, addresses the way entrepreneurs are currently reacting to it (and how they could be doing it better), and lays down some tough truth on the attitude you need in order to survive when the unexpected goes down. Listen in to get ahead of those still frozen in fear.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/coronavirus/
 
Get More Involved: 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  3. Join The Elite Underdog Alphas With The Free Underdog Report: https://underdogempowerment.com/report
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
